dc:description: Fragment of yellowed woven wool fabric with remnants of three tapestry bands of dark green wool and undyed linen.  Minimum width of each band is 0.4 cm, maximum is 1.9 cm.  Linen slit tapestry elements are approximately 0.2 cm by 0.4 cm.  There is a small remnant of a similar fabric that has been sewn on near the center of the fragment, with warps at right angles.
